name: Basic Form
steps: Pivot ninety degrees to the left, front stance and down block.
Step forward to a front stance, single middle punch.
Pivot one-hundred eighty degrees to the right, front stance, down block.
Step forward to a front stance, single middle punch.
Pivot ninety degrees to the left, front stance and down block.
Step forward, front stance, inside middle block.
Step forward, front stance, inside middle block.
Step forward, front stance, middle punch and kihap.
Pivot two-hundred seventy degrees to the left, front stance and rising block.
Step forward to a front stance, single middle punch.
Pivot one-hundred eighty degrees to the right, front stance and rising block.
Step forward to a front stance, single middle punch.
Pivot ninety degrees to the left,front stance and down block.
Front kick, step forward front stance and middle punch.
Front kick, step forward front stance and middle punch.
Front kick, step forward front stance, middle punch and kihap.
Pivot two-hundred seventy degrees to the left, front stance and down block.
Step forward, front stance and middle punch.
Pivot one-hundred eighty degrees to the right, front stance and down block.
Step forward, front stance and middle punch.
